202-advertiser_page_details:
Details:

  • Users click on any other type of ad to open the advertiser page.
  • Blocks all other ads (except audio ads).
  • Ad pages are hosted by an external URL, not by Spotify.

Specs

Technical Details Please deliver the URL of the Advertiser Page to have it integrated into the Spotify player.
202-advertiser_page_overview: A microsite seamlessly integrated into the Spotify player. The Advertiser Page can contain practically any content you'd find on a webpage, including videos, clickable images, blogs, news, links, and comments.
202-audio_ads_details:
Details:

  • Audio ads play your audio commercial between songs.
  • Spotify displays an ad image in the Cover Art area and a clickable Campaign Name & Advertiser for users to click on.
  • No long audioblocks: 30-second ad every 15 minutes
  • Only 1 destination URL can be used. Not possible for cover art to have a different URL from the clickable campaign name.
  • Audio runs on desktop, web, mobile & tablet.

Specs

Audio File:

Length: 30 seconds maximum
File Types: WAV, MP3
Max File Size: 1MB
Audio: WAV - 16-bit 44.1 kHz
MP3 - at least 192 kbps

Image File (Hosted by Spotify)

Dimensions: 640 x 640 pixels
File Types: JPG
File Size: 200k
3rd Party Tags: click command and 1x1 tracking pixel only
202-audio_ads_overview: A high impact, unavoidable format comprised of an audio spot, cover art, and clickable campaign name.
202-billboard_details:
Details:

  • Billboard ads are large screensaver images, displayed after 5 minutes of user inactivity.
  • When the user returns, the Billboard remains for 2 seconds. It then minimizes to a clickable Leaderboard or Skyscraper.
  • The screensaver itself is not clickable, therefore the tracking for this placement is done via the clickable Leaderboard it resolves to.

Specs

Billboard/Screensaver:

Ad Unit Size: 800x435
File Types: JPG (no flash)
3rd Party Tags: Billboard Co-AD
Animation: Unlimited
File Size: 100k

If Spotify Hosted:

File Types: JPG
3rd Party Tags Click command and 1x1 pixel
Animation: Unlimited; 30 seconds maximum
File Size: 100k

If Flash, must be 3rd Party Hosted:

3rd Party Tags: JavaScript or iFrame Tags
Animation: Unlimited; Flash requires to work in latest Chrome version
Flash Version: 8+ accepted
File Size: N/A
Audio: User initiated
Video: FLV only
Destination URL: Must open in new browser

Billboard Companion Banner:

Ad Unit Size: 728x90

If Companion Banner is Spotify Hosted:

File Types: JPG
3rd Party Tags Click command and 1x1 pixel
Animation: Unlimited; 30 seconds maximum
File Size: 100k

If Companion Banner is Flash, must be 3rd Party Hosted:

3rd Party Tags: JavaScript or iFrame Tags
Animation: Unlimited; Flash requires to work in latest Chrome version
Flash Version: 8+ accepted
File Size: N/A
Audio: User initiated
Video: FLV only
Destination URL: Must open in new browser

Recommendation

Please refer to our Best Practices Guide for Click Tags
202-billboard_overview: A format with a huge presence. It acts like a screensaver after a few minutes of player inactivity.  Billboards on Spotify will only be available though December 31, 2014.
202-branded_playlist_details:
Details:

  • Branded Playlists are Spotify playlists that contain a branded cover art image and text.
  • The playlist text can contain links to any webpage or Spotify content.
  • All Branded Playlists must be user generated (due to label restrictions) and must have a minimum of 40 tracks.
  • There can only be one track per artist within the playlist.
  • Branded playlists have the capability to launch a Lightbox via the clickable text.

Specs

Image File

Dimensions: 1280x1280
File Types: JPG
3rd Party Tags: None
Animation: None
File Size: 100k

Playlist Title & Text

Title: 40 characters max
Clickable Text: 200 characters max
URL to external site if to be made clickable
202-branded_playlist_overview: Custom user-generated playlists with brand logo, custom text, and optional link to your campaign.
202-display_details:
Details:

  • Display ads are clickable images displayed for 30 seconds.
  • No roadblock possible (only 1 format visible at a time)
  • No expandable formats allowed
  • Ads are 100% visible and will not serve if Spotify is minimized.
  • Leaderboard ads are only displayed on the desktop and web Spotify platforms.

Specs

If Spotify hosted:

Dimensions: 728x90 (leaderboard), 160x600 (skyscraper)
Ad unit size: 728x90
File Types: JPG, GIF
3rd Party Tags Click command and 1x1 pixel
Animation: Unlimited
File Size: 100KB

If 3rd Party Hosted:

Required to use for rich media.
Backup Image required for all rich media.
3rd Party Tags: JavaScript or iFrame Tags
Animation: Unlimited
Flash is not supported by Spotify applications. HTML5 required.
File Size: N/A
Audio: User initiated
Video: Autostart OK. Must contain Play, Stop and Volume controls.
Make sure you are using an HTML5 video player.
Make sure the video file is in .webm or .ogv format
Destination URL: Must open in new browser.
All third-party tags and tracking URLs need to be in https. The URLs should not re-direct to any http destinations.

Recommendation

Please refer to our Best Practices Guide for Click Tags
202-display_overview: Leaderboard ads in the Spotify player are served when the user is interacting with Spotify.
202-formats_overview: Reach your audience on mobile, tablet and desktop.
202-homepage_takeover_details:
Details:

  • Homepage takeovers are a combination of a background skin and interactive area that takes over the Spotify homepage with 100% SOV.
  • Users can click on both the background image and the interactive area.
  • Make sure the interactive area and the background skin are designed to fit together. The interactive area is a layer that floats on top of the background skin, and does not support transparency.
  • Please keep key info inside the interactive area.

Specs

Background Image

Must be Spotify Hosted
Ad Unit Size: 1200x270 pixels
File Types: JPG
3rd Party Tags: Click Command and 1x1 pixel; No Flash
Animation: None
File Size: Max 1MB

If Spotify Hosted

File Types: JPG
Other Notes: No transparent images
3rd Party Tags: Click Command and 1x1 pixel
Animation: Unlimited
File Size: 100k

If Flash, must be 3rd Party Hosted

3rd Party Tags: JavaScript or iFrame Tags
Animation: Unlimited; Flash required to work in latest Chrome Version
Other Notes: No transparent images
Other Notes: Flash Version 8+ accepted
File Size: N/A
Audio: User Initiated
Video: Autostart OK. Must contain Play, Stop and Volume controls
Destination URL: Must open in new browser

Interactive Area

Required to use for rich media.
Backup Image required for all rich media.
Ad Unit Size: 800x235 pixels

If Interactive Area is Spotify Hosted

File Types: JPG
Other Notes: No transparent images
3rd Party Tags: Click Command and 1x1 pixel
Animation: Unlimited
File Size: 100k

If Interactive Area is Flash, must be 3rd Party Hosted

3rd Party Tags: JavaScript or iFrame Tags
Animation: Unlimited; Flash required to work in latest Chrome Version
Other Notes: No transparent images
Other Notes: Flash is not supported by Spotify applications. HTML5 required.
Audio: User Initiated
Video: Autostart OK. Must contain Play, Stop and Volume controls.
Make sure you are using an HTML5 video player.
Make sure the video file is in .webm or .ogv format
Destination URL: Must open in new browser.
All third-party tags and tracking URLs need to be in https. The URLs should not re-direct to any http destinations.

Recommendation

Do not brand in top right corner as this area will be covered by a “Sponsored" button. Please refer to .PSD template.
202-homepage_takeover_overview: Block out a full day for your brand on our Homepage.
202-lightbox_details:
Details:

  • The Lightbox can contain nearly anything: image galleries, flash videos, games, interactive gadets, live streaming, and more.
  • The Lightbox is a user-initiated format. It's triggered when the user clicks on a Spotify Ad Format.
  • The Lightbox never has conflicting audio. Music from Spotify stops when the Lightbox is triggered to command full attention.

Specs

Skin (Hosted by Spotify)

Max: 1200x700 pixels
File Types: JPG, PNG
3rd Party Tags: none
Animation: none
File Size: 100k
Other Notes: Background image is not clickable

Lightbox Content - (Not Hosted by Spotify)

Dimensions: 650x300 pixels
Other Notes: Content of Lightbox must be flush top left of browser window
Other Notes: No maximum file size
Animation: Unlimited
Video: Flash 24 fps/max (FLV only)
Audio/Video Control: Player must contain Play, Stop, On/Off Volume Controls Audio/Video can start automatically
Click-through links: must open in a new browser window
Other Notes: Only supply us the URL where the content is hosted
202-lightbox_overview: A user-initiated overlay window launched by a Spotify Ad. It can host content such as Flash video, data capture, competitions, live streaming, and game demos.
